0x00000000.description: Memory Unit Load Balancer Hash Multiply
0x00000000.name: MULBHashMultiply

0x00000004.description: Memory Unit Load Balancer Hash SBoxes
0x00000004.name: MULBHashSBoxes

0x00000000.description: Memory Unit Load Balancer Engine Config/Control
0x00000000.name: MULBControl

0x00010000.description: MU Load Balancer Engine ECC Monitor for the Descriptor SRAM - ECCControl Registers 0,1,2
0x00010000.name: MULBECCControlDescriptor

0x00020000.description: MU Load Balancer Engine ECC Monitor for the Local Hash SRAM - ECCControl Registers 0,1
0x00020000.name: MULBECCControlLocalHash

0x00030000.description: MU Load Balancer Engine ECC Monitor for the Local Stat SRAM - ECCControl Registers 0,1,2,3
0x00030000.name: MULBECCControlLocalStat

0x00040000.description: MU Load Balancer Engine ECC Monitor for the Local ID Table SRAM - ECCControl Registers 0
0x00040000.name: MULBECCControlLocalID

fields.description: Value of 'm63' for hash multiplication equation m63.x^63 + m53.x^53 + m36.x^36 + m4.x^4
fields.name: Mult63

fields.description: Value of 'm53' for hash multiplication equation m63.x^63 + m53.x^53 + m36.x^36 + m4.x^4
fields.name: Mult53

fields.description: Value of 'm36' for hash multiplication equation m63.x^63 + m53.x^53 + m36.x^36 + m4.x^4
fields.name: Mult36

fields.description: Value of 'm4' for hash multiplication equation m63.x^63 + m53.x^53 + m36.x^36 + m4.x^4
fields.name: Mult4

fields.description: If deasserted, residue is not put through sboxes.
fields.name: HashSboxEnable

fields.description: Number of sboxes to use, minus 1 - bottom 4*(n+1) bits are put through sboxes, rest not.
fields.name: HashSbox
